creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: dark brown wood texture spiral form with a cone appearance; wide on one end and pointed on the other
image_copyright: © Copyright 2011 Sakurako Matsushima. All Rights Reserved.
text: Matsushima Sakurako attended Tokyo University of the Arts and is today Professor at Utsunomiya University in Tochigi Prefecture. Since 1989 she has exhibited her work, which ranges from sculptures to large, wearable body ornaments. These three works show her versatility in materials, from works made just of bamboo and lacquer to highly decorated and delicate wall installations.
title: Spiraled IV
